title: Room 26
features: Is it all in his head?

There’s something to be said about the power of uncertainty and how it attaches itself to our deepest fears.Game designer Tibi and his girlfriend Mia are looking forward to spending some relaxing days at a cozy mountain cabin. A sinister sighting will change Tibi's life for the worse...Years later, he still obsesses about the event and decides to return to the cabin to investigate, in the hope that everything was just in his head.A whirlwind of disturbing happenings, a missing man, an occult ritual, the old gypsy Baba haunting his dreams and his lack of sleep make him question his own sanity.Every day he is left without an answer is another day his paranoia amplifies … unless he can locate the source of his living nightmare and lift the curse.
, mixing elements of occult, supernatural suspense and psychological thriller, with a hint of humor.
description: Compulsive and gripping! Suspenseful, addictive and complex!A very well-written book with wonderfully-interesting characters. The suspense builds at just the right pace as the story unfolds.Will keep you swiping the pages furiously. Worthy of your TBR list
Horror with a European flair. The author follows a young couple as they unravel a mystery that begins in Room 26.Has Tibi gone mad? Is he a murderer?Gypsies and monsters spice this entertaining novel
